channel.title: Posts on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Feminism for the 99 percent: A Manifesto
item.description: A friend got this as part of her online leftists' reading club and since I’ve been facing trouble reading since last 6 months and this book being less than 100 pages long, I thought I would give it a try to get back into the habit. I never read anything related to feminism or infact something like a manifesto. As a man, I wouldn’t call myself a feminist and at best aim to be a feminist ally with some holdover guilt.

item.title: How To Create This Site
item.description: Step 1: Install Git and Hugo brew install git hugo To verify your install git version hugo version Step 2: Create a Github User Site Go to https://github.com/new Step 3: Clone the repository git clone https://github.com/LooseImpala/looseimpala.github.io.git cd looseimpala.github.io âš“ Replace the username with yours. Step 3: Create a New Hugo Site hugo new site . --force The above will create a new Hugo site in the user site folder
